improvement_list.improvement_desc: Division by zero.  The value of y will be 0 when x is an even number. Add a check to ensure y is not 0 before performing the division. For example, add an if condition to check if y is not 0. If it is 0, handle it appropriately (either use a default value or throw an exception).
The variable y can be 0 based on the conditional statement. Dividing by zero will result in a runtime error. Add a check to make sure y is not zero before dividing x by y.
Unreachable code path. The condition `x % 2` will always be true when x is an odd number. Therefore, the else block will never be executed.
